properties.areaDesc: Lake St. Clair Open Lake (U.S. Portion)
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 3:51AM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 22 knots from the
northwest with gusts up to 33 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 2 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 3
feet.

* WHERE...Lake St Clair.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 4 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING
